title: S4 Ep162: Fashion Hogwash: Tuesday, September 14th, 2021
itunes:title: Fashion Hogwash: Tuesday, September 14th, 2021
description:
• Met Gala 2021 Red Carpet Recap (via PEOPLE)
  • Nicki Minaj skips Met Gala over vaccine mandate, makes ‘impotence’ claim (Page Six)
  • Channing Tatum and Zoë Kravitz walk Met Gala 2021 red carpet separately (Page Six)
  • Kate Hudson is engaged to Danny Fujikawa after five years of dating (Page Six)
  • Harry Styles and Florence Pugh make out in ‘Don’t Worry Darling’ teaser (Page Six)
Dear Toasters Advice Segment

The Morning Toast with Claudia (@girlwithnojob) and Jackie Oshry (@jackieoshry)
Merch: https://shopmorningtoast.com/
